title: Do you use herbal medicines or supplements? Why or why not?
description: Answer (1 of 3): I'm happy to provide a counterpoint to the naysayers with an actual use case. When I feel a cold coming on, I take oil of oregano, olive leaf extract, zinc, bee propolis, and elderberry extract. That combination I find particularly effective at knocking back the common cold and u...
